title: Govt extends RP Goyal's additional charge as NHPC CMD by 3 months
description: The government has extended Rajendra Prasad Goyal's additional charge as NHPC's CMD by three months, starting from June 1, 2024. This decision was disclosed in a regulatory filing. Goyal, who is the Director of Finance at NHPC, has been holding the additional charge of CMD since March 1, 2024.
